channel.title: Novajade's HodgePodge Consortium
channel.description:
Every-other Week. Hour to 2-Hour Long House Music Podcast, with some "Eclectic Hour" shows. Stay tuned!
This podcast has been in service since 7.17.06.
View Past Episodes by scrolling to the bottom of the page and clicking the "archive" link below the Calendar on the right-hand side (Program Archive section). Or simply, just go to: http://novajade.podomatic.com/archive
To see the track listings for all past shows, direct your browser here:
http://www.podfeed.net/episodes.asp?id=7705&ct=1
JOIN NOVA JADE*S E-NEWSLETTER http://eepurl.com/gyQX
NOVA JADE*S E-NEWSIE ARCHIVE http://tiny.cc/djnovajadeblast
DJ Nova Jade* - In It To Win It FlashForward Mix from djnovajade at Letsmix.com.

item.title: NovaJade's HodgePodge Consortium Show ::: Episode 3.6 [67:12]
item.description: "Untitled" So, here's a new mix for ya'll. Sorry it's a bit late - I've been busy as all get-all. At any rate, there are no track listings for this episode, but please do listen and enjoy as usual! Spread the word, NJ* email: novajade@podomatic.com
item.dc:creator: Tera "Nova Jade*
item.itunes:summary:
"Untitled"
So, here's a new mix for ya'll. Sorry it's a bit late - I've been busy as all get-all. At any rate, there are no track listings for this episode, but please do listen and enjoy as usual!
Spread the word,
NJ* email: novajade@podomatic.com

item.title: NovaJade's Hodgepodge Consortium Episode 3.5 - [74:12]
item.description: "Sayin' goodbye to August 2007" *this episode has some explicit language* YO! What a wonderfully busy and eye-opening month August has been for me. One week I dj'd a women's music festival with the most fierce line-up of artists (myspace.com/serafemme). The week following, I performed on the mic with some more incredible female artists, and the experience, again, was simply magical (myspace.com/sapphosreturn). This weekend (it just doesn't stop), I'm modeling and dj'ing a fashion show benifiting aids (www.womynzbrunchbunch.org), going to an opening casting call for America's Next Top Model and also working a gig where I'll be doing a meet and greet with Country artist, Toby Keith... And, I know it will no longer be August, but to finish my 4 week-long extravaganza, I'll be dj'ing an event that I helped logistically plan in the beginning stages, with Margaret Cho poppin' in to do a lil' somethin'-somethin' herself (Sept 7-9th :: myspace.com/tongue2tonguela) It's been a crazy summer all around, I must say! Photos are always up at myspace.com/djnovajade and also at my private account (myspace.com/terag), but I have to get a message first for the terag account to add you. With all that said and done, here's your playlist for today, August 31, 2007. Stay tuned as in the coming weeks, I'll also be starting dj'ing at local university, USC... :-) Thank you for listening. Please spread the word! And VOTE for me for DJ MAG'S TOP 100 DJs. Voting closes on 25th September. Results announced at a glittering party in London on 24th October (details to follow soon), and this list is so meaningful for djs. Tell all your friends to go to this link: http://www.djmag.com/index.php?op=top_100 and remember the name: DJ NOVA JADE Thank you! Stay zen, Nova Jade* (Photo/Artist credit: Ms. Justine (myspace.com/bodydesgins) for Sappho's Return Show, 8.25.07) **************** 1. "FAME" (The original soundtrack from the motion picture "Fame") 2. Anita Ward - "I Love the Nightlife" 3. Paris Red - "Love Hurts (Terry's Remix)" 4. Ciara - "Get Up" 5. DJ Sativa - "You Used 2 Hold Me" 6. Roger Sanchez - "You Can't Change Me" 7. Unknown Artist - "House Shoes' Partyzup" [Beatnuts Remix] 8. Craig Hamilton - "Been a Long Time (You Ready Song)" 9. High Aspirations feat Roberta Flack - "Killing Me Softly" 10. Cosmic Belt - "I Love This Feeling" 11. Joshua (Iz) + Karl Injex - "The Sun, The Moon, The Stars" 12. Black Eyed Peas Feat. Sergio Mendes - "Mas que nada [tocadisco's las favelas electricas mix]" 13. Tim Deluxe - "Less Talk, More Action!" 14. Barbara Mason - "Another Man [Junior Vasquez' Discoverse Mix]" 15. Testament - "Sun Shining" 16. Michelle Weeks, Craig Mitchell - "Step Out On Faith (Shlavens & D-Lav Dirty Tech Mix)" 17. Fight Club - "Spread Love" 18. RHV - "Secret Mix (Club edit)" 19. Science 2104 - "Untitled" 20. "???" (white label) 21. Bally Sagoo - "Tum Bin Jaya (Grooverider Remix)"
item.dc:creator: Tera "Nova Jade*
item.itunes:summary:
"Sayin' goodbye to August 2007" *this episode has some explicit language*
YO!
What a wonderfully busy and eye-opening month August has been for me. One week I dj'd a women's music festival with the most fierce line-up of artists (myspace.com/serafemme). The week following, I performed on the mic with some more incredible female artists, and the experience, again, was simply magical (myspace.com/sapphosreturn). This weekend (it just doesn't stop), I'm modeling and dj'ing a fashion show benifiting aids (www.womynzbrunchbunch.org), going to an opening casting call for America's Next Top Model and also working a gig where I'll be doing a meet and greet with Country artist, Toby Keith... And, I know it will no longer be August, but to finish my 4 week-long extravaganza, I'll be dj'ing an event that I helped logistically plan in the beginning stages, with Margaret Cho poppin' in to do a lil' somethin'-somethin' herself (Sept 7-9th :: myspace.com/tongue2tonguela)
It's been a crazy summer all around, I must say! Photos are always up at myspace.com/djnovajade and also at my private account (myspace.com/terag), but I have to get a message first for the terag account to add you.
With all that said and done, here's your playlist for today, August 31, 2007. Stay tuned as in the coming weeks, I'll also be starting dj'ing at local university, USC... :-)
Thank you for listening. Please spread the word! And VOTE for me for DJ MAG'S TOP 100 DJs. Voting closes on 25th September. Results announced at a glittering party in London on 24th October (details to follow soon), and this list is so meaningful for djs. Tell all your friends to go to this link:
http://www.djmag.com/index.php?op=top_100
and remember the name: DJ NOVA JADE
Thank you!
Stay zen,
Nova Jade* (Photo/Artist credit: Ms. Justine (myspace.com/bodydesgins) for Sappho's Return Show, 8.25.07)
****************
1. "FAME" (The original soundtrack from the motion picture "Fame") 2. Anita Ward - "I Love the Nightlife" 3. Paris Red - "Love Hurts (Terry's Remix)" 4. Ciara - "Get Up" 5. DJ Sativa - "You Used 2 Hold Me" 6. Roger Sanchez - "You Can't Change Me" 7. Unknown Artist - "House Shoes' Partyzup" [Beatnuts Remix] 8. Craig Hamilton - "Been a Long Time (You Ready Song)" 9. High Aspirations feat Roberta Flack - "Killing Me Softly" 10. Cosmic Belt - "I Love This Feeling" 11. Joshua (Iz) + Karl Injex - "The Sun, The Moon, The Stars" 12. Black Eyed Peas Feat. Sergio Mendes - "Mas que nada [tocadisco's las favelas electricas mix]" 13. Tim Deluxe - "Less Talk, More Action!" 14. Barbara Mason - "Another Man [Junior Vasquez' Discoverse Mix]" 15. Testament - "Sun Shining" 16. Michelle Weeks, Craig Mitchell - "Step Out On Faith (Shlavens & D-Lav Dirty Tech Mix)" 17. Fight Club - "Spread Love" 18. RHV - "Secret Mix (Club edit)" 19. Science 2104 - "Untitled" 20. "???" (white label) 21. Bally Sagoo - "Tum Bin Jaya (Grooverider Remix)"
